items.title: Colts let AFC South lead slip away with critical loss to Texans
items.summary: The Indianapolis Colts let an early lead in the AFC South standings slip away, falling 20-16 to the Houston Texans at Lucas Oil Stadium. items.title: Colts' CB Sauce Gardner discusses injury vs. Texans in Week 13
items.summary: After exiting the Colts' Week 13 game with an injury, CB Sauce Gardner discussed the injury with reporters.

items.title: Young inspires as Panthers upset Rams
items.summary: Bryce Young threw three touchdowns as the Carolina Panthers halted the in-form Los Angeles Rams' six-game unbeaten streak with an upset 31-28 victory in the NFL on Sunday.Carolina quarterback Young tossed two daring second-half touchdowns on fourth down to give the Panthers a precious win heading into the final sprint for postseason places.

items.title: Panthers' Bryce Young now the youngest QB in NFL history to reach this stat
items.summary: Bryce Young, with Sunday's triumphant showing against the Rams, became the youngest QB in NFL history to achieve this stat . . .

items.title: Smyth kicks field goal on NFL debut for Saints
items.summary: Charlie Smyth kicks a 56-yard field goal in his first regular-season game for the New Orleans Saints as they fall to defeat against the Miami Dolphins.

The Colts and Jaguars are now tied atop the division at 8-4 after Jacksonville blew out Tennessee on Sunday, with the Texans [...]

items.title: Sideline to Sideline: Favorite College Moment

With Indianapolis set to host the Big Ten Championship Game next weekend between No. 1 Ohio State and No. 2 Indiana, Chris asks the players what is their favorite memory of playing college football.

items.title: Colts Blue Zone Podcast 443: Big Letdown from Colts in KC
